title: Identifying What Each Term Represents
text: $$x$$ represents the number of months that have passed, and P(x) represents the number of wolves in the habitat at $$x$$ months.
speech: x  represents the number of months that have passed, and P(x) represents the number of wolves in the habitat at  x,  months.

title: How to Find the Initial Population of Wolves
text: The initial population of wolves is P(x) when $$x=0$$.
speech: The initial population of wolves is P(x) when  x is equal to 0 .
pacedSpeech: The initial population of wolves is P(x) when   x is equal to 0
